prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: He has worked on numerous scientific projects for the Czech Ornithological Society and is actively involved in the tech community. Pavol regularly gives lectures at conferences, serves as a jury member, and mentors in various Czech and international competitions.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Title should be concise and clear
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
